data.title: A evening to remember.
data.text: Larry and  Jeannie have made  the liquor choices in the basement one of the finest that I have ever frequented,  Friendly bartenders and waiters and waitresses make it a fine place to dine also. Just stop bye for appetizers and look at the choices behind the counter, and continue on for a great tasting evening. Sunday brunch is the best in town.

data.title: Stellar bourbon in the cellar!
data.text: Spirits (in basement of The Miller House) is an extraordinary selection of pretty much every bourbon you'd ever want.  They've got bourbons ranging from inexpensive to "my wife is going to kill me."  If you're in the area and you want to sample the best bourbons in the world...Spirits is for you!

data.title: Most bourbon I've ever seen!
data.text: If you want to try different bourbons this is the place! They have over 400 different bottles of bourbons. They even have their own bourbon which was some of the best I've had in Kentucky. Food was great as well as the service and we will be going back soon.

data.title: 400 bottles of bourbon
data.text: This historical house in Owensboro provides a great "taste" of Kentucky with over 400 bottles of bourbon to tickle the taste buds.  The atmosphere is really laid back and chill.  The staff is friendly and knowledgable.  We had a great chat with the owner while sitting up at the bar and he treated us to a really fine shot of one of his favorites.  Next time we will make time to have a meal at the restaurant here which looks really classy.  This great spot can't be missed if you're visiting Owensboro!
